Html:
I want to create a transformation object (instance of ICoordinateTransformation) from "NTF (Paris) / France II" coordinate system (srid epsg 27582) to "WGS84" (srid epsg 4326).

It seems that Proj.Net doesn't support Lambert_Conformal_Conic_1SP projection used for the first coordinate system : NTF (Paris) / France II.

How can I make this transformation with Proj.Net ?

Thanks in advance for your answer.
